scripts.in: npm i && concurrently "cd server && npm i " "cd rclient && npm i"
scripts.full: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd rclient && npm start"
scripts.full-drop: concurrently "cd server && npm run start-drop" "cd rclient && npm start"
scripts.jsdoc: cd rclient && npm run jsdoc && cd ../server && npm run jsdoc
scripts.jsdoc-open: cd rclient && npm run jsdoc-open && cd ../server && npm run jsdoc-open
